Infosys Enterprise Service Management Café is an AI-powered plug and play solution with all the process templates you need and the ready-to-deploy code that makes your ServiceNow implementation 40 to 50 percent faster.Its benefits start with the consolidation and rationalization of the tools you already have. It helps you predict service outages, automatically orchestrate remediation and enable users to self-serve their needs from the Café App Store.
Infosys Enterprise Service Management Café transforms Welsh Water's Service Management
Peter Jones – Head of Service at DwR Cymru Welsh Water, speaks about how the Infosys partnership with Welsh Water has transformed Service Management at Welsh Water. Welsh Water recognized the need to transform it’s IT services from technology, reliability, flexibility and cost perspectives. Infosys was selected to help Welsh Water transform their core IT with an Integrated Service Management Platform for collaboration and user engagement.
Infosys Enterprise Service Management Café enhanced Service Management at Versum Materials
Michael Mayernik – IT Operations Manager at Versum Materials, speaks about how the Infosys partnership has transformed Service Management at Versum and set them on the path of Service Experience Transformation.
